member.name: T:messages.Gds.Websocket.AsyncGDSClient
member.summary: A client class that can be used to communicate with a GDS instance by WebSocket connection. The class is thread-safe, meaning can be used from multiple threads to send messages (still only uses one listener).

The URI of the GDS instance
The username used for communication. Cannot be null or empty
The password used for password authentication. Null otherwise
Timeout used for the connection establishment. Value most be strictly positive
The certificate used for TLS authentication
The log used by the client.

member.name: M:messages.Gds.Websocket.AsyncGDSClient.AsyncGDSClientBuilder.Build
member.summary: Builds the client using the values previously specified.

member.name: T:messages.Gds.Websocket.ConnectionState
member.summary: Class holding possible state values. This is a class instead of an enum to make the values useable with Interlocked.CompareExchange(..)

members.member: The client is instantiated but connect() was not yet called.
The connect() method was called on the client, the underlying channels are being created
Channels successfully initialized, trying to establish the TCP/WebSocket Connection
The WebSocket connection (and TLS) is successfully established
The login message was successfully sent to the GDS
The login was successful. Client is ready to use
The connection was closed after a successful login (from either the client or the GDS side).
Error happened during the initialization of the client.

member.name: M:messages.Gds.Websocket.ConnectionState.AsText(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a text representation for the given value
member.param: The status code

member.name: T:messages.Gds.Websocket.IGDSMessageListener
member.summary: Abstract class used as a Message Listener (callback) for the GDS communication. The methods are not mandatory to be overwritten, but if they are called (that kind of message is received) without an implementation in the subclass most of them will throw a NotImplementedException.

member.name: M:messages.Gds.Websocket.IGDSMessageListener.OnConnectionSuccess(Gds.Messages.Header.MessageHeader,Gds.Messages.Data.ConnectionAckData)
member.summary: Called upon successfully establishing a connection (with accepted login) towards the GDS.
member.param: The received header
The received login data

member.name: M:messages.Gds.Websocket.IGDSMessageListener.OnConnectionFailure(Gds.Utils.Either{System.Exception,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{Gds.Messages.Header.MessageHeader,Gds.Messages.Data.ConnectionAckData}})
member.summary: Called if the connection (or the login) is unsuccessful. The error is either caused by an exception or a login failure, this can be retreived from the parameter.
member.param: The cause of the failure

member.name: M:messages.Gds.Websocket.IGDSMessageListener.OnDisconnect
member.summary: Called upon disconnecting from the GDS (only if the connection was already established and successfully logged in).

member.name: M:messages.Gds.Websocket.IGDSMessageListener.OnEventAck3(Gds.Messages.Header.MessageHeader,Gds.Messages.Data.EventAckData)

The received event ACK
